title: Padding Strings in JavaScript
description: In this lab, we will explore the pad() function in JavaScript. The pad() function allows you to pad a string on both sides with a specified character to achieve a certain length. We will learn how to use the String.prototype.padStart() and String.prototype.padEnd() methods to achieve this.

meta.title: Mastering String Padding in JavaScript
meta.description: Explore the power of the pad() function to format strings with ease.
